nodes.text: The cattorobe was a type of musical wind instrument. It consisted of a cylindrical body with ribbing along much of its length and a tubular mouthpiece extending from the thinner end. In the year 32 BBY, a Bith musician playing as part of a band in the stands of the Mos Espa Grand Arena on the planet Tatooine used a cattorobe during the Boonta Eve Classic podrace.

A cattorobe first appeared as a prop in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The prop was not named in the film, but received identification in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia, which was written by Adam Bray, Tricia Barr and Cole Horton.
